mapper.sql: s_typeid, s_name, s_r_time, s_m_time, w_uid, s_state, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select * from dd_stype where
s_name like CONCAT('%', #{s_name}, '%') and
s_state=1
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from dd_stype where
s_name=#{s_name} and
s_state=1
mapper.insert: insert into dd_stype (s_typeid, s_name, s_r_time, s_m_time, w_uid, s_state, filed1, filed2) values (#{s_typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{s_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dd_stype
s_typeid,
s_name,
s_r_time,
s_m_time,
w_uid,
s_state,
filed1,
filed2,
#{s_typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{s_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dd_stype
s_name = #{s_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_r_time = #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_m_time = #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_state = #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where s_typeid = #{s_typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dd_stype set s_name = #{s_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_r_time = #{s_r_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_m_time = #{s_m_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_uid = #{w_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_state = #{s_state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER} where s_typeid = #{s_typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
